cavescape.title: CaveScape
cavescape.subtitle: 2019 - Community Game Jam
cavescape.description: CaveScape is a 2-bit platformer metroidvania made for the Community Game Jam 2019, with the theme "The game is a liar". This exploration platformer lies about the items and powerups you get.

torrato.title: Torrato
torrato.description: The mouse got stuck inside an oven and it's unbearably hot! Made for Dev-U Jam!

spacial.title: Spacial Dog
spacial.description: Prototype made for Ludum Dare 42. Run out of space, avoiding asteroids and a solar explosion while collecting fuel.

awaken.title: Awaken the Dev-U
awaken.description: Mobile choose-your-adventure game made for "Integra Unifei 2020"
